posts.post_title: FS/FT:Old Judge Whitney with Dog SOLD
posts.post_content:
After realizing I just can't afford to delve into this set I'm looking to move this card for what I paid for it.Im asking with confirmed delivery included.Payment by paypal gift or check/money order.Please contact me however is most convenient for you.I am also open to a trade for T210's or Richmond Colt T209's.Thank you

Now 235.00 delivered
